nodes.bodyText: This is not tied to modeling exercises in specific right? So I am wondering whether it is better to move it in a component that is shared to all other exercise types. This would be useful if you decide to extend the rating feature and allow it for file-upload and programming exercises as well :)

For now it is tied to the modeling exercises. I've realized that the text-exercises have a different "result structure" than the modeling exercise. I would suggest to leave it in there and move it if file-upload/programming exercises share the same result structure as the modeling exercises. What do you think about that?
